content: this has to be the best dish scrubby i have ever made the red heart scrubby yarn definitely gets the job done this scrubby is double sided with extra scrubbing power stitched in and has been designed to mimic those old school netted pot scrubbers or the thicker round wool soap scouring pads the entire project is made as one piece in continuous rounds and is only seamed closed at the very end of the project you will need one ball of red heart scrubby yarn with one ball you should be able to make 3 scrubbies an h 5 00mm hook a stitch marker and a yarn needle the double duty dish scrubby measures approximately 3 75 inches in diameter thank you for stopping by my listing i hope you enjoy the pattern stacey in stitches
